thread.title: TTC Extra: Middle Schooler Blamed For Rape To The Contrary
thread.title_full: Video: TTC Extra: Middle Schooler Blamed For Rape | Watch To The Contrary Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: TTC Extra: Middle Schooler Blamed For Rape To The Contrary
text: The Los Angeles Unified School District is under fire for a civil suit against a student that sent a teacher to jail for lewd acts. LAUSD claimed the 14 year old was "mature enough to consent". PANEL: Del. Eleanor Holmes Norton (D-DC), Kim Gandy, Manal Omar, Sabrina Schaeffer
